subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Islanders’ streak of 19 playoff series won from 1980 to 1984, an achievement unmatched in hockey history, is often overlooked in discussions of the N.H.L.’s best teams.
snippet: The Islanders’ streak of 19 playoff series won from 1980 to 1984, an achievement unmatched in hockey history, is often overlooked in discussions of the N.H.L.’s best teams.
